description: Dashboard for visualizing JMeter metrics in influxdb2

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "countError")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()

failuresPercentages = () => {

countResponseTime=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["application"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "application"])
  
sumerrorCount=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "countError")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["application"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "application"])
  
  return join(
      tables:{countResponseTime:countResponseTime, sumerrorCount:sumerrorCount},
      on:["application"]
    )
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
             
             percentage: r._value_sumerrorCount / r._value_countResponseTime         
    }))       
}

failuresPercentages()

successPercentage = () => {

allCount=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["application"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "application"])
  
okCount=from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ok")
  |> group(columns: ["application"])
  |> sum()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "application"])
  
  return join(
      tables:{allCount:allCount, okCount:okCount},
      on:["application"]
    )
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
             
             percentage: r._value_okCount / r._value_allCount         
    }))       
}

successPercentage()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "sb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sum()

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "maxAT")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Active Threads")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_field", "_value", "_time"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${send_interval}))}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Transations Per Second")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "countError")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${send_interval}))}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Errors Per Second")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "sb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${send_interval}))}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Sent Bytes")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "rb")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${send_interval}))}))
  |> set(key: "_field", value: "Received Bytes")

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: median, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct95.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] == "all")
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: mean, createEmpty: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value / float(v: ${send_interval}))}))

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> mean()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Avg RT"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct50.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> median()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Median RT"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "min")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> min()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Min RT"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "max")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> max()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Max RT"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct90.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.90, method: "exact_mean")
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "pct90"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pct95.0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "exact_mean")
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "pct95"})

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Count"})

countAll = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> toFloat()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])

countError = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ko")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> toFloat()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction"])

join(
      tables:{countAll:countAll, countError:countError},
      on:["transaction"]
    )
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
             transaction: r.transaction,
             ErrorRate: r._value_countError / r._value_countAll         
}))

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["statut"] == "ko")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${send_interval}s, fn: sum, createEmpty: true)

from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jmeter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["application"] == "${application}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["transaction"] != "all")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["responseCode"] != "")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["responseCode"] != "0")
  |> group(columns: ["transaction", "responseCode", "responseMessage"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "transaction", "responseCode", "responseMessage"])
  |> sum()
  |> group()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Count"})

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "application",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "events",
    start: -1000d
  )
list.label: application
list.name: application
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
    bucket: v.bucket,
    tag: "application",
    predicate: (r) => r._measurement == "events",
    start: -1000d
  )

title: JMeter test results influxdb2 standart backend listener
